title: rPkgsInstall
description: A tool for installing, checking, updating, or removing R packages for AFNI.

packages.title: R packages list
packages.description: List of R packages to install, update, or remove. Use 'ALL' to refer to all AFNI-required packages.

download_site.title: Download site
download_site.description: Specify the package repository website. Default is 'http://cloud.r-project.org'.

check.title: Check flag
check.description: Verify whether the specified R packages are installed on the computer without installing/updating/removing them.

update.title: Update flag
update.description: Update the specified R packages. If packages are not installed, they will be installed.

remove.title: Remove flag
remove.description: Remove the specified R packages from the system.
